title: Anatomy & Structure
tip: Note the consistent structure in hands, face, and proportions.

title: Lighting & Shadows
tip: Do the shadows make sense based on the light source?

title: Textures & Surfaces
tip: Watch for overly smooth or plastic-like textures.

title: Symmetry & Composition
tip: Perfect symmetry may be a red flag.

title: Coherence in Detail
tip: Look for inconsistencies and object blending errors.

title: Symbolism & Intent
tip: Can you sense emotional or narrative intention?
